author: Yun Li
title: Protesters stage 'die-in' at Wall Street bull statue, cover it with blood and climb atop it
description: A group of protesters calling for climate change vandalized the iconic Wall Street charging bull on Monday, pouring red paint while climbing atop it.
content:
A group of protesters calling for climate change vandalized the iconic Wall Street charging bull on Monday, pouring red paint while climbing atop it.
The protesters responsible belong to an organization called Extinction Rebellion, which organized a demonstr… [+825 chars]
